item.title: Persona 3 Reload version 1.03 update for Switch 2 now available, improves frame rate
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

Performance Mode now targets 60 frames per second in TV Mode.

ATLUS has released the version 1.03 update for the Switch 2 version of Persona 3 Reload, which improves performance wtih a targeted 60 frames per second Performance Mode in TV Mode, and boosts frame rate stability across all other modes.

Here are the details:

  • Performance Mode (only available in TV Mode) – Targets 60 frames per second.
  • TV Mode and Handheld Mode – Improved frame rate stability.
  • The Switch 2 patch update for the free demo will take place in the coming days (exact timing to be announced).

The Switch 2 version of Persona 3 Reload is also on sale for the first time ever. From today until January 4, 2026, users can purchase the digital version via Nintendo eShop at a 15 percent-off discount price of $50.99.

Persona 3 Reload is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store.

item.title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds ‘NiGHTS Content Drop’ update launches December 24
item.content:encoded:
SEGA will release the “NiGHTS Content Drop” update for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds on December 24 at 4:00 p.m. PT / 7:00 p.m. ET, the company announced.

The update will include the following content:

  • NiGHTS as a playable character
  • NiGHTS’ vehicle, Dream Sleeper
  • Special emotes and sounds

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.
